resources.string:
Welcome and thank you for choosing our application.

 This software offers innovative services, through the use of GPS and Bluetooth.
 The user interface is simple and intuitive. After you will have accepted to grant the required permissions the screen of your device will display the geographical map of you position, from there you will be able to navigate manually or through the search bar above the map.
 When you will find a place of your interest, you will be able to obtain info in real time on the number of people present in that area, using the central button below the map.
 You will also be able to memorize your favourite locations and the places you have been to with the other two buttons below the map.
 We cordially invite you to consult the upper right menu in case of any doubt or question regarding the app, we hope you will find it useful.
 
 Kotjava Team

string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: What is the purpose of this application?
What is the purpose of the required authorizations?
Is this the app\'s final version?

string-array.name: answers
string-array.item: The application\'s purpose is to ease the life of its users by allowing them to be informed on how many people are gathered in one place, so as to allow to plan ahead to avoid lines, be it when in need of medical consultation or to go shopping, in a easily and without slowing their devices.

To work as intended the application needs access to resources of the device such as: GPS, Bluetooth and some storage space in the memory. The gathered data are used ONLY for the expressed purpose of the software and do NOT encompass sensitive information of any kind.
